data.lyric:
[ti:Everything Has Changed (feat. Ed Sheeran) (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift/Ed Sheeran]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Everything Has Changed (feat. Ed Sheeran) (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift/Ed Sheeran
[00:00.35]Lyrics by：Ed Sheeran/Taylor Swift
[00:00.52]Composed by：Ed Sheeran/Taylor Swift
[00:00.68]Ed Sheeran：
[00:00.74]You good to go
[00:01.65]Taylor Swift：
[00:10.15]All I knew this morning when I woke
[00:14.92]
[00:15.86]Is I know something now
[00:18.11]Know something now I didn't before
[00:20.85]
[00:21.83]And all I've seen since 18 hours ago
[00:26.87]Is green eyes and freckles and your smile
[00:29.37]In the back of my mind making me feel like
[00:32.30]Taylor Swift/Ed Sheeran：
[00:33.11]I just wanna know you better
[00:35.08]Know you better know you better now
[00:38.48]
[00:39.25]I just wanna know you better
[00:41.07]Know you better know you better now
[00:45.17]I just wanna know you better
[00:47.08]Know you better know you better now
[00:50.52]
[00:51.10]I just wanna know you know you know you
[00:55.69]
[00:56.37]'Cause all I know is we said "Hello"
[00:59.21]And your eyes look like coming home
[01:02.13]All I know is a simple name
[01:05.42]
[01:05.96]Everything has changed
[01:08.59]All I know is you held the door
[01:11.37]You'll be mine and I'll be yours
[01:14.27]All I know since yesterday
[01:17.47]
[01:18.14]Is everything has changed
[01:20.95]Ed Sheeran/Taylor Swift：
[01:21.85]
[01:27.87]And all my walls stood tall painted blue
[01:32.61]
[01:34.42]But I'll take 'em down take 'em down
[01:36.92]And open up the door for you
[01:38.62]
[01:39.83]And all I feel in my stomach is butterflies
[01:45.07]The beautiful kind making up for lost time
[01:47.50]Taking flight making me feel like
[01:50.46]Taylor Swift/Ed Sheeran：
[01:51.28]I just wanna know you better
[01:53.04]Know you better know you better now
[01:56.48]
[01:57.21]I just wanna know you better
[01:58.99]Know you better know you better now
[02:03.13]I just wanna know you better
[02:05.02]Know you better know you better now
[02:09.05]I just wanna know you know you know you
[02:13.70]
[02:14.34]'Cause all I know is we said "Hello"
[02:17.25]And your eyes look like coming home
[02:20.21]All I know is a simple name
[02:24.13]Everything has changed
[02:26.75]All I know is you held the door
[02:29.42]You'll be mine and I'll be yours
[02:32.30]All I know since yesterday
[02:35.49]
[02:36.12]Is everything has changed
[02:38.91]
[02:39.65]Come back and tell me why
[02:42.09]
[02:42.79]I'm feeling like I've missed you all this time
[02:48.27]
[02:51.67]And meet me there tonight
[02:54.22]
[02:54.79]And let me know that it's not all in my mind
[03:02.95]Taylor Swift：
[03:03.31]I just wanna know you better
[03:04.99]Know you better know you better now
[03:09.20]I just wanna know you know you know you
[03:13.87]Taylor Swift/Ed Sheeran：
[03:14.59]All I know is we said "Hello"
[03:17.33]And your eyes look like coming home
[03:20.11]All I know is a simple name
[03:23.65]
[03:24.22]Everything has changed
[03:26.69]All I know is you held the door
[03:29.41]You'll be mine and I'll be yours
[03:32.37]All I know since yesterday
[03:35.43]
[03:36.18]Is everything has changed
[03:38.44]Taylor Swift：
[03:38.80]All I know is we said "Hello"
[03:40.96]
[03:41.58]So dust off your highest hopes
[03:44.47]All I know is pouring rain
[03:46.95]And everything has changed
[03:50.75]All I know is a new found grace
[03:53.51]All my days I'll know your face
[03:56.44]All I know since yesterday
[03:59.09]
[04:00.16]Is everything has changed
data.trans:
[ti:但是足以改变我的一切 (feat. Ed Sheeran) (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift/Ed Sheeran]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.35]//
[00:00.52]//
[00:00.68]//
[00:00.74]你准备好了吗
[00:01.65]//
[00:10.15]在那个早晨 我睁开惺忪的眼
[00:14.92]
[00:15.86]我只意识到
[00:18.11]一个我从未体验过的感受
[00:20.85]
[00:21.83]在这十八个小时间
[00:26.87]我的脑海中浮现的都是你翠绿的眼睛 你淡淡的雀斑 你的微笑 
[00:29.37]挥之不去 令我满心只想
[00:32.30]//
[00:33.11]我好想再多了解你一点
[00:35.08]好想再多了解你一点
[00:38.48]
[00:39.25]我好想再多了解你一点
[00:41.07]好想再多了解你一点
[00:45.17]我好想再多了解你一点
[00:47.08]好想再多了解你一点
[00:50.52]
[00:51.10]我好想再多了解你一点
[00:55.69]
[00:56.37]我们只是像路人般地打招呼
[00:59.21]透过你双眸 似乎找到了归宿
[01:02.13]那时 我只是知道了你的名字
[01:05.42]
[01:05.96]但是足以改变我的一切
[01:08.59]我记得 你绅士般地替我开门
[01:11.37]那些小小的瞬间 都让我们更加契合
[01:14.27]我只知道自昨天起
[01:17.47]
[01:18.14]一切都不一样了
[01:20.95]//
[01:21.85]
[01:27.87]在你之前 我心中的高墙耸立着 满是忧郁
[01:32.61]
[01:34.42]但我会推倒它们
[01:36.92]此刻只为你敞开通往心房的门
[01:38.62]
[01:39.83]总觉得有种暖暖的感觉 小鹿乱撞 那种有点雀跃的感觉
[01:45.07]美丽的情感 弥补了那些失去的时光
[01:47.50]像是搭乘飞机 让我那么心安
[01:50.46]//
[01:51.28]我好想再多了解你一点
[01:53.04]好想再多了解你一点
[01:56.48]
[01:57.21]我好想再多了解你一点
[01:58.99]好想再多了解你一点
[02:03.13]我好想再多了解你一点
[02:05.02]好想再多了解你一点
[02:09.05]我好想再多了解你一点
[02:13.70]
[02:14.34]我们只是像路人般地打招呼
[02:17.25]透过你双眸 似乎找到了归宿
[02:20.21]那时 我只是知道了你的名字
[02:24.13]但是足以改变我的一切
[02:26.75]我记得 你绅士般地替我开门
[02:29.42]那些小小的瞬间 都让我们更加契合
[02:32.30]我只知道自昨天起
[02:35.49]
[02:36.12]一切都不一样了
[02:38.91]
[02:39.65]快来到我身边 告诉我为什么
[02:42.09]
[02:42.79]好想你 一直一直都好想
[02:48.27]
[02:51.67]我们今晚在老地方见吧
[02:54.22]
[02:54.79]我想知道 你也这样想着我吗
[03:02.95]//
[03:03.31]我好想再多了解你一点
[03:04.99]好想再多了解你一点
[03:09.20]我好想再多了解你一点
[03:13.87]//
[03:14.59]我们只是像路人般地打招呼
[03:17.33]透过你双眸 似乎找到了归宿
[03:20.11]那时 我只是知道了你的名字
[03:23.65]
[03:24.22]但是足以改变我的一切
[03:26.69]我记得 你绅士般地替我开门
[03:29.41]那些小小的瞬间 都让我们更加契合
[03:32.37]我只知道自昨天起
[03:35.43]
[03:36.18]一切都不一样了
[03:38.44]//
[03:38.80]我们只是像路人般地打招呼
[03:40.96]
[03:41.58]所以别要期望太高
[03:44.47]在那场大雨中 你和我之间
[03:46.95]一切都不一样了
[03:50.75]这是一种新生的美好
[03:53.51]生活中的每一秒都出现你的脸庞
[03:56.44]我只知道自昨天起
[03:59.09]
[04:00.16]一切都不一样了
